item.title: Ultra Soft Test Strips
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: We aim to show you accurate product information. Manufacturers, suppliers and others provide what you see here, and we have not verified it. Get accurate results each time by using the Unistrip Generic Blood Glucose Test Strips 50-Count Box. Make these part of your normal routine so that you are able to avoid any mistakes […]
item.content:encoded:
We aim to show you accurate product information. Manufacturers, suppliers and others provide what you see here, and we have not verified it.

Get accurate results each time by using the Unistrip Generic Blood Glucose Test Strips 50-Count Box. Make these part of your normal routine so that you are able to avoid any mistakes and confusion during the process. The Unistrip glucose test strips work with the OneTouch Ultra, OneTouch Ultra2, OneTouch UltraSmart and OneTouch UltraMini meters. The combination of these machines along with the strips will save the user test units. The capillary action automatically draws the blood sample in. The blood glucose strips are approved for alternate site testing. They will make a useful addition to the rest of your tools and supplies. You will get a box that contains a count of 50 individual pieces. Not only will you be able to get the correct readings, but it will only take you one round to do it. They are designed to be simple to use and come with all of the instructions that you need.

Unistrip Generic Blood Glucose Test Strips 50-Count Box:

  • UniStrip blood glucose test strips, box of 50
  • Delivers accurate and fast results
  • Allows alternate site testing (AST) from the fingertip
  • Designed for home monitoring of glucose levels
  • Compatible with OneTouch Ultra, OneTouch Ultra 2 (II), OneTouch Ultra Smart, OneTouch Ultra Mini
  • Unistrip glucose test strips will get the job done

item.title: Accu Check Test Strips
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Baumer Team S.R.O, Inc., the maker of Accu-Chek products, is a leading provider of blood sugar monitoring systems and insulin pumps. With more than 40 years experience, our number one goal is to help people living with diabetes track and manage their blood sugar so they may have better control of their health. Through well-established […]
item.content:encoded:
Baumer Team S.R.O, Inc., the maker of Accu-Chek products, is a leading provider of blood sugar monitoring systems and insulin pumps. With more than 40 years experience, our number one goal is to help people living with diabetes track and manage their blood sugar so they may have better control of their health.

Through well-established relationships with healthcare professionals, governments, and institutions in healthcare systems, we are able to meet the complex and changing needs of people with diabetes and their healthcare providers with highly innovative products and diabetes management solutions. We continually strive to create new products and resources to help fit better blood sugar control into our customers’ lifestyles.

Baumer Team S.R.O, based in Indianapolis, Indiana, is a company with a proud history and continued commitment to innovation. Our products and services aim to make a difference by helping improve quality of life. Roche offers a broad range of diagnostic tests and systems that play a pivotal role in the groundbreaking area of integrated healthcare solutions. Our products cover the early detection, targeted screening, evaluation and monitoring of a variety of health issues.

item.title: One Touch Test Strips
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: A test strip is a band/piece/strip of paper or other material used for biological testing. Specifically, test strip may refer to: Food testing strips Glucose meter test strip Lipolysis test strip Urine test strip Diabates Test Strips in Pregnancy Before using OneTouch® test strips and control solution, carefully read the User Guide and inserts that come with the […]
item.content:encoded:
A test strip is a band/piece/strip of paper or other material used for biological testing.

Specifically, test strip may refer to:

  • Food testing strips
  • Glucose meter test strip
  • Lipolysis test strip
  • Urine test strip
  • Diabates Test Strips in Pregnancy

Before using OneTouch® test strips and control solution, carefully read the User Guide and inserts that come with the components of the system.

OneTouch Ultra® control solution contains a known amount of glucose and is used to check that the meter and the test strips are working properly.

See full instructions in your User Guide on how to perform a control solution test.

item.title: Contour Test Strips
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: When blood is placed onto the test strip, it reacts with a chemical called glucose oxidase producing gluconic acid from the glucose in the blood. At the other end of the test strip, the meter transfers a current to the test strip. The test strip has electric terminals which allow the meter to measure the […]
item.content:encoded:
When blood is placed onto the test strip, it reacts with a chemical called glucose oxidase producing gluconic acid from the glucose in the blood. At the other end of the test strip, the meter transfers a current to the test strip. The test strip has electric terminals which allow the meter to measure the current between the terminals.

The current between the terminals changes depending on the level of gluconic acid that has been produced. The blood glucose meter then uses an algorithm to work out the blood glucose level based upon the difference in current.

Some blood glucose test strips allow the reapplication of more blood to the same test strip if needed during the test. The amount of blood required by a test strip can vary between manufacturers. Generally, between 0.5 μl to 1 μl of blood is required.</>

Some test strips, not so commonly used these days, do not require a meter. When blood is placed on the active part of the strip and then wiped off after a specified number of seconds, the reagent will change colour and the result can be obtained by matching the colour of against a colour chart on the side of the pot.

item.title: eBsensor Test Strips
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Due to now day’s lifestyle, diseases like diabetes are very common to happen. But to regulate and keep a check on these diseases Medicare Enterprises provide you with number of solutions like Blood Glucose Test Strip. These diabetic test strips are an essential part of monitoring blood glucose and a wide variety of diabetes test […]
item.content:encoded:
Due to now day’s lifestyle, diseases like diabetes are very common to happen. But to regulate and keep a check on these diseases Medicare Enterprises provide you with number of solutions like Blood Glucose Test Strip. These diabetic test strips are an essential part of monitoring blood glucose and a wide variety of diabetes test strips are available in the market. With these strip a diabetic person can check his blood glucose anywhere anytime with no risk added. These test strips require very small amount of blood to check the quantity of blood glucose.

Some of the highlights are:

  • Safe and easy to handle.
  • Diabetic person can himself conduct the test
  • Affordable price
  • Approved from medical association.

The benefits include a reduction in the occurrence rate and severity of long-term complications from hyperglycemia as well as a reduction in the short-term, potentially life-threatening complications of hypoglycemia.

item.title: Vivachek Test Strips
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: VivaChek Laboratories, Inc. was established in Wilmington, Delaware, USA in June 2013 with its primary function to serve the International market. Since then, it becomes a reliable manufacturer of POCT (point-of-caring testing) products and blood glucose monitoring systems with partners in over 70 countries worldwide. We also have a branch office, VivaChekLifeCare, located in Chennai, […]
item.content:encoded:
VivaChek Laboratories, Inc. was established in Wilmington, Delaware, USA in June 2013 with its primary function to serve the International market. Since then, it becomes a reliable manufacturer of POCT (point-of-caring testing) products and blood glucose monitoring systems with partners in over 70 countries worldwide. We also have a branch office, VivaChekLifeCare, located in Chennai, India, as well as a manufacturing center, VivaChek Biotech (Hangzhou) Co., Ltd, located in Hangzhou, China. In order to focus on the US market, Able Diagnostics Inc. was established in San Diego, California, USA in Oct 2017.

VivaChek also focuses on investment in new product development. Most of our R & D team members have more than 10 years of experience in POCT product development; they have already successfully optimized our products and are working on new product development intelligently and efficiently.

VivaChek Laboratories has launched VivaChekTMIno and VivaChekTM FAD Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems in the international and Chinese markets, more than hundreds of million accurate glucose tests have been delivered worldwide, helping people with diabetes to live in a healthier life.

In addition, VivaChek Laboratories launched the POCT Immunofluorescence Analyzer in the International market in 2018. The analyzer will include rapid tests with cardiac markers, renal functions, tumor markers, diabetes, infection, and hormone tests.VivaChek Laboratories also plans to launch a hemoglobin meter, a cholesterol test system, ketone / blood glucose / uric acid 4 in 1 analyzer and many other innovative instruments. We are committed to bringing user-friendly products to customers worldwide.

item.title: Optima Test Strips
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Optima Test Strips Range of Glucose Measurement 20-600 mg/dL (1.1-33.3 mmol/L) Sample Type Capillary Whole Blood Calibration against (sample type) Plasma- Equivalent Test Time 6 seconds Sample Volume 0.7 uL Sample Application Capillary Effect Operating Temperature 10-40 (50~104) Operating Humidity 20-80% RH Memory capacity 180 Average 7, 14, and 28 days Downloadable RS-232 Battery Type […]
item.content:encoded:
Optima Test Strips

Range of Glucose Measurement 20-600 mg/dL (1.1-33.3 mmol/L)
Sample Type Capillary Whole Blood
Calibration against (sample type) Plasma- Equivalent
Test Time 6 seconds
Sample Volume 0.7 uL
Sample Application Capillary Effect
Operating Temperature 10-40 (50~104)
Operating Humidity 20-80% RH
Memory capacity 180
Average 7, 14, and 28 days
Downloadable RS-232
Battery Type 3V Li-Battery (CR2032) X1
Battery Life more than 1,000 tests
Auto OFF 3 minutes
Meter Dimensions 80 X 48 X 15 mm
Meter Weight 37 g (with battery)
Meter Warranty 5 years
